mapper.select: select nickname, member_gg.member_id, reply_num, review_num, upload_date, content from member_gg, reply_gg where member_gg.member_id = reply_gg.member_id and review_num = #{review_num} order by reply_num DESC
mapper.insert: insert into reply_gg(review_num, member_id, content) values (#{review_num}, #{member_id}, #{content})
